DataElement.preferredName: Voice Handicap Index Functional F1 Frequency Voice Makes it Difficult to Hear Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how frequently their voice makes it difficult for people to hear them, using a 5 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Voice Handicap Index Functional Subscale Temporal Frequency Voice Makes it Difficult to Hear Me Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subscale of the Voice Handicap Index that measures an individual's perception of the effect of their voice handicap on their daily activity._The number of occurrences of something within a given time period._A question about how often an individual's voice makes it difficult for people to hear them._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A subscale of the Voice Handicap Index that measures an individual's perception of the effect of their voice handicap on their daily activity.

Concepts.definition: A subscale of the Voice Handicap Index that measures an individual's perception of the effect of their voice handicap on their daily activity.

Property.preferredName: Temporal Frequency Voice Makes it Difficult to Hear Me Score
Property.preferredDefinition: The number of occurrences of something within a given time period.:A question about how often an individual's voice makes it difficult for people to hear them.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: The number of occurrences of something within a given time period.

Concepts.longName: Voice Makes it Difficult to Hear Me
Concepts.definition: A question about how often an individual's voice makes it difficult for people to hear them.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.origin: VHI-10:Voice Handicap Index, 10 Items. Rosen, C, Lee, A, Osborne, J, Zullo, T, and Murry, T.,Development and Validation of the Voice Handicap Index- 10.
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for CCR study in C3D as requested by P.Asangong. mc 6/24/16 Fixed special characters in the definition DW 06-27-2016

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Numeric scores from 0 (never) to 4 (always) on a Likert scale used with the Voice Handicap Index.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: At all times; on every occasion.

Concepts.definition: At all times; on every occasion.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something happens or happened almost all of the time.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something happens or happened almost all of the time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

Concepts.definition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Added "Sometimes" to represent the MSAS value domain.ghd.01.27.15

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer that something rarely happens.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer that something rarely happens.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).

Concepts.definition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueDomain.origin: VHI-10:Voice Handicap Index, 10 Items. Rosen, C, Lee, A, Osborne, J, Zullo, T, and Murry, T.,Development and Validation of the Voice Handicap Index- 10.
ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created for NRG study in Rave per request by S.Rouillard. mc 3/5/15
